mapper.select: select a.content_id content_id, b.title title, a.station_id station_id, b.longitude, b.latitude, b.addr1, b.first_image, b.first_image2, c.overview, d.longitude stationLng, d.latitude stationLat, d.name stationName from station_tour_spot a, attraction_info b, attraction_description c, station_info d where a.content_id = b.content_id and b.content_id = c.content_id and a.station_id = d.station_id and a.station_id = #{stationId} and b.content_type_id = 12 order by b.title asc;
